review_blob: perfume nose upon first open.  Seltzer feel on the tongue; crisp and clean.  Definetly has that "belgian ale" taste.  Tones down to a citrus smooth, slightly hoppy after taste.
Golden color, looks beautiful, hoppy scent. No hoppy flavor.  Goes down smooth with no bite.
Nice start, smokey citrus flavor, but the taste turns flat at finish.  Maybe bad bottle.

One of "THE" best IPAs that ive had in a long time.  I normally get burned out on an ipa that i like, the taste is usually hit/miss.  But not this!  Its hard to come by and available only in 4 packs.  If you come upon it, buy it!
